alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 4:04PM EST until January 21 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 24 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds will be 5 to 10 mph with a few gusts up to 15 mph possible, especially across the hilltops.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Brings pets and animals inside to protect them for the very cold conditions.
